data.name: Talisman: The Horus Heresy Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The official soundtrack for Talisman: The Horus Heresy, composed by Mattias Westlund.

Included tracks -

  • Ascend - 4:17
  • Balance of Power - 3:05
  • Heretic's Rule - 3:12
  • Immaterium - 2:14
  • Imperium Aeternus - 3:38
  • Shadows On The Fringe - 3:52
  • Strength In Numbers - 2:54
  • Terminus - 2:39
  • Unconquered - 4:13
  • Void Between The Stars - 2:32

All tracks are in mp3 format, 320kbps. FLAC versions are included too and are downloaded to the 'Flacs' folder.

Hear more of Mattias' music on his Soundcloud page - https://soundcloud.com/mattiaswestlund

data.short_description: The official soundtrack for Talisman: The Horus Heresy, composed by Mattias Westlund.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x1024 resolution
  • Sound Card: On board
  • Additional Notes: Requires software capable of playing MP3 files.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires software capable of playing MP3 files.
